info.title: News Aggregator API
info.description: A comprehensive news aggregator API that fetches articles from NewsAPI, The Guardian, and The New York Times. Provides advanced search, filtering, and personalization features.

get.summary: Get all articles with filtering and search
get.description: Retrieve paginated list of articles with advanced filtering. Features auto-fetch: if search query returns no results, automatically fetches from news sources (NewsAPI, Guardian, NYTimes)

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search keyword (searches in title, description, content). Triggers auto-fetch if no results found.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by source(s). Comma-separated for multiple sources.

X-Auto-Fetch.description: Indicates if articles were auto-fetched from news sources

get.summary: Get a single article by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific article
Retrieve articles filtered by user's saved preferences (sources, categories, authors). Requires authentication.
Retrieve a list of all unique categories from stored articles
Retrieve a list of all unique authors from stored articles

post.description: Create a new user account and receive an authentication token
Authenticate user and receive an authentication token
Revoke the user's current authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user's information
Retrieve a list of all available news sources with article counts
Retrieve detailed information about a specific news source
Retrieve the authenticated user's saved preferences for sources, categories, and authors

put.description: Update the authenticated user's preferences for personalized article feed

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's preferences and reset to defaults

sanctum.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Articles
tags.description: Article search, filtering, and retrieval endpoints with auto-fetch feature
